property.name: id
property.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        //Alert the id of KoolListBox.
        alert(listbox.id);
    }
</script>

method.name: get_item
method.shortdesc: Get listbox item at an position.
method.longdesc: Get listbox item at an position.

method.name: delete_item
method.shortdesc: Delete an item at a position.
method.longdesc: Delete an item at a position.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		listbox.delete_item(3);//Delete item at position 3.
    }
</script>

method.name: select_item
method.shortdesc: Select an item at a position.
method.longdesc: Select an item at a position.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		listbox.select_item(3);//Select item at position 3.
    }
</script>

method.name: unselect_item
method.shortdesc: Unselect an item at a position.
method.longdesc: Unselect an item at a position.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		listbox.unselect_item(3);//Unselect item at position 3.
    }
</script>

method.name: move_item
method.shortdesc: Move an item from a position to another.
method.longdesc: Move an item from a position to another.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		listbox.mov_item(3,5);Move item at position 3 to position 5.
    }
</script>

method.name: transfer_to_destination
method.shortdesc: Transfer item at a position to destination listbox.
method.longdesc: Transfer item at a position to destination listbox.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		listbox.transfer_to_destination(3);//Transfer item at position 3 to destination.
    }
</script>

method.name: transfer_to_destination
method.shortdesc: Transfer an item to destination listbox.
method.longdesc: Transfer an item to destination listbox.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var _item = listbox.get_item(3);
		listbox.transfer_to_destination(_item);
    }
</script>

method.name: transfer_all_to_destination
method.shortdesc: Transfer all items to destination listbox.
method.longdesc: Transfer all items to destination listbox.

method.name: transfer_all_from_destination
method.shortdesc: Transfer all items from destination to this listbox.
method.longdesc: Transfer all items from destination to this listbox.

method.name: transfer_from_destination
method.shortdesc: Transfer an item at a position from destination.
method.longdesc: Transfer an item at a position from destination.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		listbox.transfer_from_destination(3);// Transfer item at position 3 in destination listbox.
    }
</script>

method.name: transfer_from_destination
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var _item = destination_listbox.get_item(3);
		listbox.transfer_from_destination(_item);
    }
</script>
